mapper.sql: resource_id, resource_url, resource_path, component, `name`, icon_cls, keep_alive, require_auth, parent_id, is_enabled, is_deleted, create_time, update_time

mapper.update:
update resource
resource_url = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_path = #{resourcePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_cls = #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keep_alive = #{keepAlive,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
require_auth = #{requireAuth,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
